Name: Windy Miller
Instructions: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. TOP with lemonade.
Review: British readers over 40 may remember the children's TV series Trumpton , Chigley and Camberwick Green . If you do, then sing between sips, "Pugh, Pugh, Barney McGrew, Cuthbert, Dibble and Grubb."
History: Discovered in 2000 at Teatro Club in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Windy Miller contains 219 calories
